name: Briny Infoway
description:
Briny Infoway has been established as Software Company in Ahmedabad, Gujarat, India since 2011. Briny Infoway has a great deal of expertise with regard to software to grow your business.
The company has a service portfolio that ranges from the traditional to advanced web technologies including WordPress, Magento, Custom PHP, CodeIgniter, jQuery, AngularJS, JavaScript. The company has been recognized for its exceptional capabilities in Responsive Design, HTML5, CSS3.
We strongly believe in “Get more than your expectation!” and we are helping our valued customers to design their own dreams. We have completed 50+ projects successfully.
Company Strategy.
Purpose To be leader in the software company by providing easy to integrate, responsive design.
Vision To provide quality services that exceeds the expectations of our esteemed customers.
Goal To build long term relationships with our customers and provide exceptional customer services by providing easy to use solution to grow their own business and brand their selves.
